About the Status Bar

The status bar is located at the bottom of the window. It contains the following information and shortcuts from left to right:

File Server Status Displays the status of the Version Manager File Server(s), if any (click to refresh status):
  • No file server is configured.

  • One or more configured file servers are not responding.

  • All configured file servers are working correctly.
System Message Displays information about the current status of Version Manager, such as "Ready" or "Loading..." or a message specific to the current action, such as "Checking In."
User ID Displays the name of the User logged in to the selected project database along with the user icon . Click this field to access the Switch User dialog box.
Workspace Displays the name of the workspace set on the selected project database along with an icon that identifies whether the workspace is private or public . Click this field to access the Set Workspace dialog box.
Files Selected Displays the number of files selected. When you select a project, this number reflects the total number of files in the project. When you select one or more files, this number reflects the total number of files selected.
